extendedInfo.description: A Wonderful & Fun Way for Kids to Celebrate Earth Day & Learn about the Environment! Gorgeous Interactive Storybook Makes Going Green & Nature Exciting & Inspiring! An Important, Educational Storybook that Teaches About The Seasons & the Earth.A charming and engaging interactive storybook about the environment for children of all ages to celebrate Earth Day and learn about the gifts of nature.  Kids will learn about the clean scent of air, refreshing water and a green environment in the context of a beautiful children's story set around the changing seasons.Earth Day inspires awareness and appreciation for our planet's natural resources and the environment. Each year, Earth Day is celebrated on April 22 in more than 175 countries to pay tribute to nature.  Earth Day is a wonderful, educational opportunity for kids to learn about the environment.  With "The Four Seasons" TabTale is proud to have created an educational contribution to Earth Day 2011.  âThe Four Seasonsâ will inspire kids to appreciate nature and take care of the environment while learning about the seasons.  Help the gardener keep the garden neat! A powerful allegory featuring a good-hearted gardener who teaches young children the importance of nature, an unspoiled green environment, and how we can contribute. Filled with wonderful interactive activities and surprises, this educational book is a source of delight to both children and parents. Children will learn about nature by growing new trees, helping clean the park, learning the value of drinking fresh water, clearing snow from the path to make it safe to walk and enjoying many other fun interactions throughout The Four Seasons."TabTaleâs interactive storybooks provide an educational and exciting interactive reading experience for our most beloved children's stories. Richly filled with innovative and engaging activities, each book inspires young childrenâs creativity and imagination in a uniquely enjoyable and interactive way.The Four Seasons - An Earth Day Interactive Children's Storybook Features:â Beautiful HD illustrations on every page that highlight nature and the environmentâ Numerous engaging & fun animations on each page create an enchanting reading experienceâ Help the gardener - interactive activitiesâ Play a Xylophone of eggsâ Dress up the snowmanâ Sing Along - Happy Earth Day, Dear Planetâ âRead to Meâ - automatically reads each page of the story to youâ âRead it Myselfâ - allows you to control the reading yourselfWE VALUE YOUR FEEDBACK:We always welcome your feedback, comments and suggestions- please take a minute to rateand review this app :) You can also contact us at: support@TabTale.comABOUT TabTale:Search âTabTaleâ on Google Play and discover more outstanding apps for young kids.TabTaleâs interactive storybooks provide an exciting and rich reading experience for manyof the most beloved children's stories. Filled with innovative and engaging activities, eachbook inspires young childrenâs creativity and imagination in a stimulating, enjoyable andinteractive way. More fantastic stories and games by TabTale LTD are coming soon. . .Join our Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/TabTaleFollow us on Twitter: @TabTaleIf you're having problems with downloads, installs, refunds, payments, or Google Play access, please contact Google Play team through the Google Play Help Center at https://market.android.com/support/ and user forum at http://www.google.com/support/forum/p/Android+Market.By downloading this application you agree to the Terms of Use of TabTale Ltd. reviews.title: CHILDHOOD SUMMIT
reviews.comment: Braced with lemonade and fog I sauntered past the meadow bog Accompanied by my collie dog. I was a little boy who loved the sounds and the shush Of the morning marshland and the bush. APP HAS A BIT OF BACKWOODS CHARM TO IT!! KIDS WILL LOVE IT!! PARENTS WILL APPRECIATE IT!! FROM JAMES MICHAEL CHAPESKIE
